channel.title: Good Ghost Mouse that Loops?
channel.description:
I need a ghost mouse I can rely on, I have ReMouse and it says I need to pay to loop more than 3 times which is lame. I tried Redmowse and it just clicks in the wrong spot sometimes.... So maybe someone has one that works 100% with Loop.
Thanks
Kozs

item.title: Good Ghost Mouse that Loops?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:8, topic:502856”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=621081.msg4249745#msg4249745 date=1362273137]

Use Simba, it’s pretty easy to learn how to make a script for that.

Link?


[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

or

http://simba.villavu.com/bin/Release/Current/SimbaInstaller.exe[/quote]

How would I set it up for a RSPS?

Read full topic

item.title: Good Ghost Mouse that Loops?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:9, topic:502856”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=621081.msg4249741#msg4249741 date=1362272819]

I need a ghost mouse I can rely on, I have ReMouse and it says I need to pay to loop more than 3 times which is lame. I tried Redmowse and it just clicks in the wrong spot sometimes… So maybe someone has one that works 100% with Loop.

Thanks

Kozs

ghostmouse;

doesn’t loop though

using it to fish atm, yes it does.
[/quote]
where is it in the settings?[/quote]

There isn’t any, it just loops until I stop it.

Read full topic
